source_text.3351: I love how when writing fiction I can represent real-life issues & my own problems through characters living in an alternate universe . Being ' human ' ( usually ) they still have to deal with all the insecurities & emotions , but I can offer a resolution that I might find unattainable Then in turn it helps me to process these thoughts and worries and I can find the space in my mind to concentrate on finding my own solutions and fulfilling some dormant wishes that I may have neglected due to feeling overwhelmed by my own inability to push forward in life .So , not only does #writing give me enormous waves of pleasure , it is actually therapeutic and offers my over-filled brain some release . I never feel more free than when I can lose myself in my character's stories and lives . #escapism #life
